title: New Augmented Reality Tech Can Turn Any Surface into Keyboard
description: Computer science doctoral student Daniel Honrales demonstrates PropType, a patent-pending technology that overlays an augmented keyboard surface onto handheld objects. Virtual keyboards are a frequent source of frustration for augmented reality (AR) users. The virtual surfaces are slow and error prone, and raising an arm to type on them can cause muscle strain known as […]

title: College student deported during Thanksgiving trip could've fought removal as a kid, US says
description: A Massachusetts college student who was deported while trying to visit family for Thanksgiving missed multiple opportunities to fight a removal order issued when she was a young child, according to a government attorney.  Any Lucia Lopez Belloza, a 19-year-old freshman at Babson College, was flown to Honduras two days after being detained at Boston's airport on Nov. 20, despite a court order on Nov. 21 that she remain in Massachusetts. title: Trump wants to change student-loan borrowing limits for nurses. Most advanced programs won't be impacted.
description: Trump's administration is changing student-loan borrowing caps for advanced degrees. Advocates said it could worsen the nursing shortage.

title: We're high earners with student debt and kids. Here's how we continue to build wealth.
description: As millennial HENRYs juggling student loans and kids, we've learned to budget, automate, and invest to stay financially secure.

title: Death of Texas college student following football tailgate ruled suicide: Police
description: The police chief said her "heart aches" for Brianna Aguilera's parents.

title: Michael Dell's journey to a $148 billion fortune began with a $1,000 investment
description: Dell founded his computer company in 1984 while a student at University of Texas. He had just $1,000 to start with.

title: I'm a 22-year-old university student building an AI startup. The hardest part is losing student life.
description: A 22-year-old cybersecurity student shares what it's like to build an AI startup in university, and why being a young founder can feel lonely.

title: After fighting for legalization, weed smokers face a harsh reality: Symptoms earlier generations didn’t experience make wake-and-bake a new kind of addiction
description: Kyle, a 20-year-old college student, says brain fog becomes a "new normal" and "it can be tough to wake up and go, ‘Oh my God, who am I?’”

title: OU student says essay grade was a violation of her rights. Read the essay
description: In the essay, she wrote traditional gender roles should not be considered stereotypes. What do you think? Read the full essay and professor responses here.

title: More student-loan borrowers could soon become eligible for lower payments and debt relief
description: Trump's Department of Education said it plans to remove the partial financial hardship requirement to enroll in income-based repayment in December.

title: Samsung CMO says AI connects your home, empowers young geniuses, and improves daily life
description: Samsung showcases AI-powered smart home connectivity, student STEM competitions, and personalized device benefits, according to CMO Allison Stransky.

title: Outrage over Trump’s bill reclassifying nursing as not a ‘professional degree’ for college students
description: Nursing organizations warn limiting access to student funding ‘threatens the very foundation of patient care’
